short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Extension for the Inline Media Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows analysts to see details about a page that effects the ads that are served.

* Recent new features *
- The ability to toggle debug mode, which will auto apply the ad_debug=true flag to adunit calls.
- Options page which allows setting additional debug options.

* Changes *
- Removed menu options from pages that a user does not have permissions on.
